maze

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.Box
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VertexInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABox, DBox, EBox, WBox

    public abstract class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements VertexInterface
    This class describes a box that is also a vertex in a graph(maze)
